Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension® Creatine Kinase (CKI) Flex® Reagent Cartridge (DF38)
Dimension® Creatine Kinase MB (MBI) Flex® Reagent Cartridge (DF32)
Regulation Name(s): Creatine Phosphokinase/Creatine Kinase or Isoenzymes Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens Dimension CKI/MBI reagent cartridges and calibrator for quantitative measurement of creatine kinase and CK-MB in serum and plasma on Dimension clinical chemistry systems
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of creatine kinase and creatine kinase MB isoenzyme activity in human serum and plasma for diagnosis and treatment of myocardial infarction and muscle diseases such as progressive, Duchenne-type muscular dystrophy
